name: Chunky Strawberry Ice Cream. Vegan Strawberry Ice Cream
description: Chunky Strawberry Ice Cream. Vegan Strawberry Ice Cream with coconut milk. Dairy-free. No banana. Easy vegan ice cream. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe serves 2
recipeIngredient: 15 oz can full fat Coconut milk (1.5 cups or 1.5 cups cashew milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the Strawberries into halves or quarters.
recipeInstructions.name: Chop the Strawberries into halves or quarters.

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep pan, add the water, sugar, salt and strawberries and cook over medium heat, until the berries are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep pan, add the water, sugar, salt and strawberries and cook over medium heat, until the berries are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash most of the berries and simmer for another 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash most of the berries and simmer for another 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, Add arrowroot/cornstarch to a 1/4 cup coconut milk. Mix well and add to the berry syrup. Mix and simmer until it comes to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, Add arrowroot/cornstarch to a 1/4 cup coconut milk. Mix well and add to the berry syrup. Mix and simmer until it comes to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool the mixture slightly. Add the remaining Coconut milk and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool the mixture slightly. Add the remaining Coconut milk and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust sweetness if needed. Add flavors like vanilla or cinnamon if you wish. Transfer to a container with a lid to freeze.

recipeInstructions.text: Freeze for an hour. Whip it up and freeze again.Serve once set.
